name: Ayushman Bharat
description: Health insurance scheme providing coverage of Rs. 5 lakh per family per year.
income_criteria: No explicit income limit; families under SECC are eligible.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
description: Financial inclusion program offering affordable access to financial services like savings accounts and insurance.
eligibility: All Indian citizens, particularly economically weaker sections.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
description: Housing scheme aiming to provide affordable housing for all by 2022.
eligibility: Economically weaker sections, LIG, and MIG groups.
income_criteria: EWS: Up to Rs. 3 lakh; LIG: Rs. 3 to 6 lakh; MIG: Rs. 6 to 18 lakh.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
description: Skill development program to train youth for industry-relevant jobs.

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
description: Provides free LPG connections to women from BPL families.
income_criteria: As per SECC or BPL criteria.

name: Digital India
description: Initiative to transform India into a digitally empowered society and knowledge economy.

name: Make in India
description: Aims to encourage companies to manufacture in India and boost domestic production.
eligibility: Businesses in manufacturing and service sectors.

name: Atal Pension Yojana (APY)
description: Pension scheme targeted at the unorganized sector, offering a fixed pension after retirement.
eligibility: Citizens aged 18 to 40 years with a bank account.

name: Stand Up India Scheme
description: Provides loans between Rs. 10 lakh to Rs. 1 crore for SC/ST and women entrepreneurs.
eligibility: SC/ST and women entrepreneurs aged 18+ starting a business.

name: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao
description: Social campaign to promote gender equality and educate the girl child.
eligibility: Focus on girl children across India.

name: Swachh Bharat Mission
description: Nationwide cleanliness drive to eliminate open defecation and improve solid waste management.

name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: Financial support of Rs. 6,000 annually to small and marginal farmers.

name: PM Mudra Yojana
description: Provides loans up to Rs. 10 lakh for non-corporate small businesses.
